positions.comment: Off Cape May, heading north.  200 mi to go
Under full sail; engine off; quiet; yea!  Loevely day.
Sunset soon; hoping for a green flash!  all is well
Safe arrival; waiting to refuel, rewater, and anchor.
Sailing toward Scituate MA, Cape Cod Bay; will stay 1 wk and visit grandkids!
Hove-to for dinner; abt 30 mi offshore; good sailing, minimal rain
Moored in Tenants Harbor, Penobscot Bay, ME.  drizzle and rain
Anchored Stonington ME; met up with sailing friends fr HOKULE'A.
Somes Harbor at head of fjord, anchored for night.  Wonderful sun.
Castine Harbor near Maine Mairtime Academy.  comfortable sleeping weather
Camden Me.  Charming town like Annapolis!
Portland ME.  Off the boat for 2 weeks.
Portland ME.  Off the boat for 2 weeks.
Mooring ball in Scituate Harbor; will wait for next front to pass
Cuttyhunk 10 days waiting weather; expect to leave Thurs 10/20
Cuttyhunk 10 days waiting weather; expect to leave Thurs 10/20
